migrationStarted.title: Lock Your Pool Shares
migrationStarted.text:
**The migration of this pool is in progress** 

You can now lock your liquidity pool tokens in the smart contract.

poolSharesLocked.title: Your pool shares have been locked
poolSharesLocked.text:
You have successfully locked your pool shares in the migration smart contract.

The migration won't be completed until 10:00 UTC 15th June 2022.

deadlineMet.title: V4 Migration Will be Completed Soon
deadlineMet.text: **You can no longer lock pool shares** The deadline for locking pool shares has passed.

migrationComplete.title: This pool has been migrated to V4
migrationComplete.text: The migration of this pool from V3 to V4 has been completed.
